name: Squash The Creeps
description:
Well! If you read the short description... It's not weird. It's hard and kinda boring for now. I will improve it, this is a early access!

So, thank you so much for playing this. Please give me some suggestions. I have a lot of plans and things but your support means a lot to me. :>

Gameplay:

P.S. Sub to my channel. I will put some amazing content there!
